Package gov.sandia.gmp.util.changenotifier

Class ChangeNotifier

java.lang.Object
gov.sandia.gmp.util.changenotifier.ChangeNotifier
public class ChangeNotifier extends Object
This notifier keeps a list of ChangeListeners, and notifies them when its fireStateChanged method is called. This implements the Observer design pattern. ChangeNotifier is the ConcreteObservable class, ChangeListener is the Observer interface, and the Objects saved in list are the ConcreteObservers.
Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $, $Date: 2009/07/21 17:03:56 $
Author:
Randall W. Simons
